--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawDogg@c... wrote:
> (Evolve probably isn't the right word for a robotic civilization.  
>And as for 
> the sexually attractive spiel, that doesn't really work since I 
>doubt 
> Cybertronians.)

I think the reason for them being smaller is because the big ones 
used to much energy, in a time of war that might have been nessasary 
but when peace came they begun looking for ways to reduce energy 
usage.
